Toshiba computers **T P/N: G86C0004T510 , Full P/N: PA3797U-1MPC A labeled engineering sample of this card (well, labeled '''Intel WiFi/WiMAX Link 6250''') has... *A model of 612ANXHMW. *A PCI ID of 8086:0087 (8086:1301). *A Wi-Fi MAC of 00:15:00:59:81:82 and a BT MAC of 00:1D:E1:0D:E3:2F. *Codes of... **MM: 900109 **TA: E62815-003 *A CoO of China.
